cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemShortDescription: The Xperience by Kentico Certified Marketer Exam is now available. Validate your marketing expertise in contact management, audience segmentation, and email marketing. Start today!
cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemTitle: Xperience by Kentico Certified Marketer Exam Now Live
cms.contentitemcommondata.ContentItemCommonDataVisualBuilderWidget:
{"editableAreas":[{"identifier":"main","sections":[{"identifier":"81a94bb9-241d-461e-84b3-0af1371d302a","type":"CommunityPortal.SingleColumnSection","properties":{"layout":"Standard","layoutParsed":0,"paddingTop":"Large","paddingTopParsed":0,"paddingBottom":"Large","paddingBottomParsed":0,"backgroundColor":"White","backgroundColorParsed":1},"zones":[{"identifier":"1f49a418-66c5-4bef-9f4d-e78a06313e21","widgets":[{"identifier":"1d1a4135-8995-436c-8f02-d1817d5b212f","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"ae3bb3de-577b-4f62-ba2a-77efda3847ba","properties":{"markdown":"Exciting news for all marketing professionals working with Xperience by Kentico—the **Certified Marketer Exam** has officially launched! This is your chance to validate your skills, enhance your professional profile, and stand out in the digital marketing field.

Whether you’re a **Marketing Implementation Specialist**, **Solution Architect**, **Consultant**, **Solution Architect**, or even **Senior Account Executive**, this certification proves you have the expertise to manage and optimize digital marketing activities in Xperience by Kentico. And the best part? The exam is available **24/7**, so you can take it whenever you’re ready.

Take the Exam?","headingLevel":"H2","headingLevelsParsed":1,"headingAlignment":"Left","headingAlignmentsParsed":0,"showHeadingAnchor":true,"id":"947e8a08-5c6e-4165-82be-f47c32c2002a"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"headingText":"b773ced1-209d-48a3-8a53-8e0996395ca2","headingLevel":"0abb76c6-1089-4397-84d0-fffaee774be8","headingLevelsParsed":"05b3fedd-41de-47b1-a114-894a58c9c470","headingAlignment":"026af2a2-8225-46dd-ae9a-b5412172d1d1","headingAlignmentsParsed":"fe3e1fdf-3019-4ba5-8e96-eba9f2eddbcc","showHeadingAnchor":"78e6ef8a-deaa-4711-b56e-d95066638323","id":"4574e1dc-d1bc-4dce-9056-0768fa2d538b"}}]},{"identifier":"86200525-061f-4346-a59e-0464d59520e9","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"12cf3f62-c779-49ad-973d-8fe15fadc49f","properties":{"markdown":"* **Boost Your Career**: Earning the Xperience by Kentico Certified Marketer title validates your expertise, and also gives you a competitive edge in the marketing industry.
* **Hands-On Experience Required**: This isn’t just a test of theory. It’s about practical knowledge and experience working with Xperience by Kentico’s powerful marketing features.
* **Collaborate with Developers Effectively**: As an Xperience by Kentico Certified Marketer, you’ll work closely with partner developers to help specify requirements that allow clients to achieve their marketing goals. This certification proves you can bridge the gap between marketing and technical implementation.
* **Tailored for Real-World Roles**: Whether you specify requirements, manage marketing activities, or work directly with clients and developers, this exam is designed for professionals who are deeply involved in digital marketing strategies.

you?","headingLevel":"H2","headingLevelsParsed":1,"headingAlignment":"Left","headingAlignmentsParsed":0,"showHeadingAnchor":true,"id":"7744bde0-a1d9-437e-91c0-9c0173d72629"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"headingText":"87449c35-f502-4a4b-b74c-5cecc7a233c8","headingLevel":"2d47cf55-b94c-46cb-8ea3-575559bd4fd9","headingLevelsParsed":"883d6864-b899-4c8f-9f97-76de09389b27","headingAlignment":"ef0265b9-ec7f-41df-99ae-e550997853bf","headingAlignmentsParsed":"0fd78fd0-aab2-4015-8b62-d046547b1599","showHeadingAnchor":"6d929f92-6b4f-4bdf-8a66-811cf198f63d","id":"e08b8a33-068d-4e0d-a89d-0e49cf579ad2"}}]},{"identifier":"814c5b96-1124-4086-a74b-9f0640253736","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"608624ea-b9ae-4462-b1c5-8bed21dcb16c","properties":{"markdown":"When you take the exam, you’ll need to demonstrate your ability to:

* Analyze business requirements and align them with Kentico’s features.

* Configure digital marketing tools for managing contacts, email campaigns, and content.

* Ensure data privacy and compliance in all your marketing efforts.

* Create targeted audience segments and deliver personalized experiences.

And that’s just the start!

next?","headingLevel":"H2","headingLevelsParsed":1,"headingAlignment":"Left","headingAlignmentsParsed":0,"showHeadingAnchor":true,"id":"1f36afe2-bc39-43cb-979b-61f490443254"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"headingText":"99956b27-d32a-46a3-a6b0-4085d319933e","headingLevel":"f76709d2-c5d5-4cf0-ad53-a39c46e78a7d","headingLevelsParsed":"dfbcd5ff-be78-4de8-812b-0c2be0957335","headingAlignment":"61539401-a697-4ea2-aaba-ef41379a816c","headingAlignmentsParsed":"b1101d79-8798-4d51-8dab-c826e8a5bcb2","showHeadingAnchor":"0945de26-d603-45ff-bd0c-d6f908b8d5e9","id":"b60d9a9f-a639-46a8-9e58-ab7e7d8aeada"}}]},{"identifier":"25307912-d2c4-48f5-9988-dac7655f1860","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"2804c2b2-898d-4695-8c39-c48dd230b443","properties":{"markdown":"To ensure you’re fully prepared, we recommend reviewing our **[Preparation Guide](https://kentico.com/services/certification/xperience-marketer-certification)**. This guide will help you familiarize yourself with the exam objectives and dive deeper into key areas like audience segmentation, optimization testing, and compliance regulations.

But remember, **experience** is key! We encourage you to complete a real-world project using Xperience by Kentico before you take the exam.

***

Ready to take your marketing expertise to the next level? **The Xperience by Kentico Certified Marketer Exam is now open**—and we’re excited to see you earn that certification. Don’t wait; start today!
